name: Egypt
startIntroPart1: From the first stirrings of life beneath water... to the great beasts of the Stone Age... to man taking his first upright steps, you have come far. Now begins your greatest quest: from this early cradle of civilization on towards the stars.
startIntroPart2: There will be those who underestimate you, but you are cunning and full of tricks, King Mentuhotep. Your charm will establish indestructible alliances with the strongest leaders of the world. Keep your friends close by your side and you will find yourself untouchable, with the glory of Egypt primed to win over the world.
declaringWar: I have had enough with you. May Amun Ra guide us!
attacked: Hah! Osiris will be pleased to welcome my enemies.
defeated: Egypt is lost. If I can't embrace my love, I will embrace the asps.
introduction: I am Isis reborn, I am the living Nile, I am Mentuhotep and an ally, if you are worthy.
tradeRequest: Generous Egypt makes you this offer.
uniques: [+20]% Production when constructing [All] wonders [in all cities]

name: Nubia
startIntroPart1: From the first stirrings of life beneath water... to the great beasts of the Stone Age... to man taking his first upright steps, you have come far. Now begins your greatest quest: from this early cradle of civilization on towards the stars.
startIntroPart2: Kaa, watchful King of Nubia, the empire you command shall claim the horizon as its border. Don't fear those who covet your abundant gold, for your archers can part their hair at five hundred paces. Your cities shall know prosperity and piety, wise king, for the Land of the Bow honors its past as surely as it builds its own future.
declaringWar: We have arrows, finely honed. We shall deliver them freely to your throat.
attacked: As predicted, you know only how to take. Come, then choose the manner of your defeat.
defeated: Though Nubia declines, our pyramids shall remain long after your plans fall to ruin.
introduction: I am Kaa of Nubia. All are welcome in our magnificent cities provided they come as friends.
tradeRequest: Generous Nubia makes you this offer.
uniques: [+20]% Production when constructing [All] wonders [in all cities]
